about_the_game:
In Dark Reflection, you find yourself in the ruins an an ancient long lost underground civilization but while the people that once called this their home might be gone, there are still dangers left behind for you to combat and figure out more about this civilization, and about yourself. Hack and slash your way through countless dark and mysterious enemies, Discover the mysteries of these ancient ruins and face the 6 bosses to learn more about it's history! You will have to Fight, Platform and Solve puzzles to reach the deepest secrets! 

With a combination of gameplay styles you'll always be looking out for the next thing to happen in this strange place. One moment you may be faced with a group of powerful enemies, and the next you might suddenly find yourself in a side scrolling platformer section, or inside an on rail shooter segment.
